resume_data.text:
Aparna Mondal
Data Scientist | Machine Learning & AI | Python, SQL, Scikit-learn | Predictive Modeling 
& Data Analytics
contact - 6290305615 maparnafeb14@gmail.com Linkdin APARNA Kolkata, West Bengal, India
SUMMARY
Python Developer with hands-on experience in data processing, feature engineering, automation, and machine learning using libraries like Pandas, 
NumPy, and Scikit-learn. Skilled in writing clean, efficient code for real-world data problems and time series forecasting. Strong foundation in data 
cleaning, EDA, and automating workflows with Python.
INTERNSHIP EXPERIENCE
Data Analyst Intern
Unified Mentors
02/2025 - 04/2025  Kolkata, India
Tools: Python, Pandas, Scikit-learn, Random Forest, Time Series
Objective: Uber Trip Forecasting | Time Series Regression
Engineered 4+ time-series features (lag, rolling mean/std) from NYC 2014 Uber trip dataset.
Reduced RMSE from 14,469 →  9,406 →  578.22 through feature engineering and model tuning.Wrote modular code for feature engineering and 
model training (Random Forest, ensemble methods).
Achieved 133.71% MAPE using Random Forest; evaluated with visual plots and error metrics.Automated evaluation metrics and visualization 
with matplotlib and seaborn.
Developed Python scripts to preprocess and transform time series data using rolling statistics and lag features.
Suggested improvements using external data (weather, holidays) and ensemble models (XGBoost).
Machine Learning Intern
FeyNN Labs Experiment with Your Knowledge
01/2025 - 03/2025  Kolkata
AI for Small Businesses - Tools Used: Python, SQL, Pandas, Seaborn, Scikit-learn
 Objective: Analyzed EV market sales trends to identify key factors influencing adoption and customer segmentation.
Collected and processed real-world EV market data, analyzing 10,000+ records to identify regional sales patterns across different city tiers.
Developed interactive Power BI dashboards, reducing data analysis time by 40% and improving visibility into EV adoption trends across regions.
Built a predictive model using regression techniques, achieving an R² score of 0.85, to forecast EV market demand for the next 3 years.
Optimized SQL queries, reducing data processing time by 40%.
Achieved 0% accuracy (cross-validation) using Random Forest and XGBoost classifiers on 13-feature dataset of Netflix-style profiles.
Automated classification pipeline enables real-time detection of fake accounts, reducing potential manual screening effort by 90%+.
PROJECTS
Laptop Price Prediction (Machine Learning Project)
09/2024 - 12/2024  odin school, hyderaba
Developed a machine learning model to predict laptop prices based on technical specifications, improving prediction accuracy by 30% through 
model optimization.
Automated reporting in Python, reducing manual effort by 50%.Built Python pipelines for data preprocessing, feature selection, and regression 
modeling.
Performed data preprocessing including handling missing values, categorical encoding, and feature engineering to enhance model performance
 — such as analyzing the impact of CPU/GPU brands and screen resolution on target outcomes.
Wrote reusable functions for price prediction logic and input validation.Built a predictive data models model to estimate laptop prices using 
technical specifications.
SKILLS
Programming: SQL Python
Data Analysis & Visualization: Data Integrity Statistics Exploratory Data Analysis Feature Engineering
Machine Learning & NLP: Predictive Modeling Clustering Regression Classification KNN XGBoost
ML Frameworks & Libraries: Plotly Pandas TensorFlow Keras Numpy Matplotlib Seaborn
